job_description:
Currently, we are looking for a Creative Designer Internship to join our dynamic team of digitally creative people who are passionate about creating high-performance digital assets 

Job Description: 
-  Create visual design in form of images, animated gif, or motion graphics from the planned editorial plan 
- Support onsite activity such as live report, photo session, video shooting, etc 
- Continuously keep update on the digital design trends 

Requirements: 
- Final Semester student or freshgraduated in Design Comunication Visual, Art, Multimedia 
- Great designer with eyes for details Illustration skill is highly preferred 
- Available for at least 3 months internship, willing to work onsite (Hybrid) 
- Resourceful, high initiative, and self-driven person 

We really appreciate your effort in submitting to this position, but we apologize that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. Thank you very much :-)
